# hasDictationKey

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the keyboard has a dictation key.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hasDictationKey: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the system dictation key is in a disabled state.

## Configuring the keyboard behaviors

- **needsInputModeSwitchKey**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the keyboard must display an input switcher key.
- **hasFullAccess**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the keyboard has full access.
